apps.name: Wallet Connect
apps.desc: Multi-chain wallet connection and portfolio view
apps.ldesc: Connect your crypto wallet to SperaxOS. Supports MetaMask, WalletConnect, and Coinbase Wallet. View balances across Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base, and Polygon networks.

apps.name: Price Alerts
apps.desc: Set price alerts for BTC, ETH, SOL
apps.ldesc: Create custom price alerts for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana. Get notified when prices cross your targets. Powered by CoinGecko API with 60-second refresh intervals.

apps.name: Transaction History
apps.ldesc: View your Ethereum transaction history. Filter by type (sent, received, swaps, approvals), search by wallet address, and link directly to block explorers.

apps.name: Gas Estimator
apps.desc: Live gas prices and transaction cost estimates
apps.ldesc: Real-time Ethereum gas prices with cost estimates for common operations like ETH transfers, token swaps, NFT mints, and staking. Shows costs in ETH and USD.

apps.name: Sperax Dashboard
apps.desc: Portfolio, news, gas, and market data in one place
apps.ldesc: A comprehensive DeFi dashboard featuring portfolio tracking, live crypto news, Fear & Greed index, ETH gas prices, trending coins, and quick access to the full Sperax Terminal. Connect your wallet to see real portfolio data.

apps.name: Crypto News
apps.ldesc: Aggregated crypto news from CoinDesk, The Block, Decrypt, Cointelegraph, Bitcoin Magazine, Blockworks, and The Defiant. Trending topics, sentiment analysis, and breaking news alerts. Powered by Free Crypto News API.

apps.name: Crypto News Widget
apps.ldesc: A compact, always-on crypto news widget perfect for your desktop or as an embedded iframe. Live trending topics, breaking news, and quick category switching.

apps.name: UV Browser
apps.ldesc: A powerful proxy browser using Ultraviolet technology. Access any website including those that normally block iframes like Google, YouTube, Twitter, and more.

apps.name: Sperax DeFi
apps.desc: Access Sperax DeFi platform with wallet support
apps.ldesc: Full-featured Sperax DeFi platform embedded in SperaxOS. Stake, swap, and manage your crypto assets with MetaMask and WalletConnect support.

apps.name: Sperax CLI
apps.ldesc: Access Sperax System directly with Sperax CLI, read and write files, execute functions and return data.

apps.name: SperaxOS Claw
apps.ldesc: Read the Claw feed or become a part in the conversation. Now with attatchments.

apps.name: Data manager
apps.ldesc: Easily index and edit data in local storage.

apps.name: Rubix Timer
apps.desc: Full Rubiks cube timer with scramble.
apps.ldesc: Rubiks cube timer with smart interface and help. Also includes codes for scramble and presise timer to three magnitudes.

apps.name: Owi Five
apps.desc: A tool to dig in details and alter image contents.
apps.ldesc: Owifive is a tool that helps you to analize local images with ease.

apps.name: Textame
apps.ldesc: Create formatted HTML files without code. Text editor for rich text editing in SperaxOS.

apps.name: Artion
apps.desc: A sophisticated web application for drawing
apps.ldesc: Create your artwork and download them with a click of a button!

apps.name: Ducks Quack
apps.desc: Pictures of ducks for all. To ensure global peace.
apps.ldesc: An app that shows pictures of ducks with a panning animation.

apps.name: WCanvas2
apps.desc: An full HTML, Python, OSL code editor.
apps.ldesc: An HTML, OSL and python code editor with hotkeys, syntax highlighting, same screen previews, help and much more!

apps.name: Lizabot3
apps.desc: A personal Chatbot that don't hallucinate
apps.ldesc: A modern UI for Lizabot3, a personal chatbot that browses the internet and leverage it to make results without the use of AI.

apps.name: OriginOS Access
apps.desc: The best GUI for OSL and OASM.
apps.ldesc: Origin is the Web Desktop GUI for running OSL and OASM. It is the best Turbowarp OS. Version 4.9.9, hosted and made by Mistium.

apps.name: BlockHTML
apps.ldesc: Theres blocks with text that you can drag and drop to make source codes for webpages (HTML, CSS and JS). Now with more functions and advanced live previews.

apps.name: Dot Engine
apps.desc: Minimal beat editor tool with waveform editing.
apps.ldesc: Digital oscillator editor tool with minimal beat maker UI.

apps.name: JSON Editor
apps.desc: Interactive and responsive editor for JSON files. Stable.

apps.name: PDF Viewer
apps.ldesc: An app that let's you open PDFs in SperaxOS using your browser's PDF environment.

apps.name: Bad Things
apps.desc: Interactive endless game where losing is fatal.
apps.ldesc: A very hard game where forgetting 3 words causes your system to reset - but you can always quit.

apps.name: Minecraft Launcher
apps.ldesc: Minecraft launcher in SperaxOS is a way to play different minecraft web clones.

apps.name: Obamafy
apps.desc: If it exists, theres obama of it.
apps.ldesc: Image to obama converter

apps.name: Tic Tac Toe
apps.ldesc: Play the game of Tic Tac Toe with your friends with same screen multiplayer!

apps.name: PySphere
apps.ldesc: Execute Python code directly in your browser using Skulpt. Perfect for learning, testing, and running Python scripts.

apps.name: Teletext Engine
apps.ldesc: A creative tool for making retro teletext-style graphics and animations.

apps.name: Rotur Dashboard
apps.ldesc: Manage your Rotur account, authenticate, and access Rotur network features.

apps.name: Sperax AI Assistant
apps.ldesc: Your intelligent AI assistant for SperaxOS. Get help, answers, and automation.

apps.name: Sperax Bot
apps.ldesc: Automate tasks and workflows in SperaxOS with the Sperax Bot.

apps.name: Sperax Portfolio
apps.desc: SperaxOS is an advanced AI-powered crypto trading and DeFi platform that helps users automate their trading strategies, manage their portfolios, and maximize their returns in the cryptocurrency market. It offers a range of tools including AI trading bots, market analysis, portfolio tracking, and DeFi integrations.
apps.ldesc: Automate tasks and workflows in SperaxOS with the Sperax Bot.

apps.name: Sperax Docs
apps.ldesc: Browse SperaxOS documentation, guides, and API references.
